title: You guys want to know why this game gets uninstalled?
body:
Left a game just now due to an incoming loss in the next 30 seconds:

My Lucian: I didn't know I had to dodge Nami bubbles, I thought they only damaged, not CC'd me.(Yes this was in Ranked)

The enemy team in the after game lobby would've said something like this: ez, gg ez, bot lane, noobs, you guys suck, lel, THIS CHAMP TOO STRONG, TWISTED FATE OP

Done. With. This. Game.

replies.body: Please Vel'koz mains can't stop playing :(
I don't think Lucian said that, that's definitely screenshot worthy.

He did say that, if I wasn't so triggered I'd have taken the screenshot, but I just left instead cause I don't have to put up with it, ranked or not. I just don't care enough to sit through the insults due to someone having the IQ of a down syndrome caterpillar.
